import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Tilt } from 'react-tilt' import './index.scss' import profile from '../../assets/images/cartoon-profile.jpg' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faLinkedin, faGithub, faInstagram, } from '@fortawesome/free-brands-svg-icons' const Home = () => { const defaultOptions = { reverse: false, // reverse the tilt direction max: 35, // max tilt rotation (degrees) perspective: 1000, // Transform perspective, the lower the more extreme the tilt gets. scale: 1, // 2 = 200%, 1.5 = 150%, etc.. speed: 1000, // Speed of the enter/exit transition transition: true, // Set a transition on enter/exit. axis: null, // What axis should be disabled. Can be X or Y. reset: true, // If the tilt effect has to be reset on exit. easing: "cubic-bezier(.01,.98,.52,.99)", // Easing on enter/exit. } return (

Hi,
I'm Rakesh
Web developer

Front-End Developer/ C++ Programmer/ UI designer

Contact me{' '}

Rakesh

kumar

{/* */}
) } export default Home
